Text: Yep it's a fake. I uploaded the real one, http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7669505/Avenged_Sevenfold_-_Carry_On

To the people who are reading this, it's not fake. iTunes just recognizes it as being pirated, and will not import it. For mac users, right click the mp3, and place the cursor over "open with..." and choose QuickTime Player. Navigate through the choices up at the top bar at the top of your computer screen until you find an export option. Click this and then iTunes. You're welcome.
